config.toggle-auto-fishing.tooltip: Press this key to toggle automatic fishing.
config.enable-auto-baiting.tooltip: When enabled, automatically applies bait to the fishing rod when it runs out.
config.enable-auto-tackling.tooltip: When enabled, automatically applies tackle to the fishing rod when it breaks.
config.enable-grab-treasure.tooltip: When enabled, automatically collects items from treasure chests during fishing.
config.enable-skip-fish-showing.tooltip: When enabled, skips the animation of showing caught fish.
config.min-stamina-for-auto-fishing.tool: Auto-fishing will be disabled when stamina falls below this value.
config.enable-auto-catch-familiar-fish.t: When enabled, automatically catches fish that you've caught at least 5 times before.
config.min-catch-count-for-auto-catch.to: The number of times a fish must be caught before it's considered 'familiar' and eligible for auto-catching.
